canvas

Class Layer

  • java.lang.Object
    • canvas.Layer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class Layer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    A layer is the container of one or more shapes. One layer can hold up to 25 shapes. A layer can lay over or under other layers. The relation is a composition, it cannot exist without a the LayerState.
    See Also:
    LayerState, Observer
